title: Catalog, M&Co: Labs Products Catalogue, 1989
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.
description:
The draft version (1993-151-424b) and the finished object (1993-151-424a) are almost identical, except as follows:  the finished cover is of black, coated, mottled cardboard, while the draft is rough cardboard; the finished is paginated, while the draft is not; the products included, while alike, differ in placement in a few instances.

The ensuing description refers to 1993-151-424a. 

The cover, title page, and additional thirty-eight pages, numbered in the upper right hand corner and, with a few exceptions, illustrated, comprise the spiral bound catalogue.

Cover - An oval gummed label in white is centered. A thin black rim is imprinted close to the outer edge; within that, M&Co (lower case italics)/ Labs (capitals) is imprinted in black.

Title page - M&Co is imprinted, centered near the top of the page; the margins of the ensuing copy are aligned with the center. The second line of type, M&Co is a design group founded in 1979, is followed by four additional lines about the Labs products, and next by address and telephone information. Cheers is imprinted in capitals just above the bottom of the page.

Pages 2-3 - Introductory pages to M&Co watches, with subject titles imprinted in capitals.

Pages 4-29 - Each page features a different watch. The design layout: On the right, a full view of the watch face attached to its straps, in abbreviated form and abutting the top and bottom edges of the page, the whole shadowed by stippling; on the left, the name of the watch in capitals, followed by descriptive copy, ranging from a single line to several lines; in the bottom right hand corner, M&Co's copyright declaration.

Pages 30 - Introductory page to pocket watches, with subject titles imprinted in capitals.

Pages 31-33 - Each page features a different pocket watch. The design layout: On the right, a full view of the watch face, shadowed; on the left, the name of the watch in capitals, followed by three lines of descriptive copy; in the bottom right hand corner, M&Co's copyright declaration.

Page 34 - Introductory page to desk accessories; the title is imprinted in the center.

Page 35-36 - Paperweight and ruler featured, one to a page.

Pages 37-38 - Marketing information on products.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalog, M&Co: Labs Products Catalogue, 1989. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.. 1993-151-424
